entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches developing early this evening and dissipating overnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 31 in the evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023
